alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:31AM CDT until May 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Wisconsin...Minnesota... Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Clayton and Grant Counties. Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Clayton, Crawford, Allamakee and Grant Counties. Mississippi River at La Crosse affecting La Crosse, Vernon and Houston Counties. Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Buffalo and Wabasha Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Winona affecting Buffalo, Trempealeau and Winona Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Winona. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Prairie Island Park begins to flood. Pumping operations are underway by the city of Winona, and dike patrols are started. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 AM CDT Saturday was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 11.0 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.4 feet on 05/24/2017. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM CDT.
